channel.title: Admin/modship buying questions
channel.description:
people keep telling me i have to give them 200k but i dont no if there telling the truth so how do i really become admin or mod but mainly admin????????????????????????? post from ~kids rank
they just do that because they play rs2-rs1 and need more money so they(most) of them just come on this make sso called a good server and make people admins for 1m sfor the money any one agree here?

item.title: Admin/modship buying questions
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

Never ever buy Admin or Modship on a server. Either work for it, and gain the position, or if the owner is friendly enough, he’ll give it to you. In my honest opinion there’s no difference what you are on the server, as long as it’s enjoyable.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin/modship buying questions
item.dc:creator: @fungame4u fungame4u
item.description:
@fungame4u wrote:

Selling admin/mod spots is against the rules anyway…

Read full topic

item.title: Admin/modship buying questions
item.dc:creator: @F0rum_Mvp F0rum Mvp
item.description:
@F0rum_Mvp wrote:

i totally agree with you…never buy admin/mod spots from owners… its a scam they will close the server down a certain time after you buy it and bang! you just wasted 200 or 300k or whatever you payed for it via runescape…

Read full topic
